title: House For Sale Colombo 8
details:
Combines a 2 story 5 bedroom main house and a 2 bedroom flat.
Situated in a desirable area and a very convenient central location.

Extent of land 15.95 Perches (price per perch 8.15 million rupees).

Total floor area 4,408 sq. ft.

Road: Approximately 30 feet wide.


Property Details:-

5 bedroom main house (3 with A/C) and a 2 bedroom flat.
3 bathrooms main house and 1 bathroom for flat (all with solar hot water showers).
2 garages and secure parking for 4 cars.
Both main house and flat have separate maids rooms and bathrooms.
2 balconies in main house and 2 balconies in the flat.
Main house has private front and rear gardens.


** Viewing strictly by appointment only.**
**Only Serious buyers need apply!**

For more information please contact me using the email form below.
